    13. PhysRevB.107.075130 Fluctuation-induced first-order phase transitions in the Kitaev-like ${d}^{4}$ honeycomb magnet (kitaev, PRB)

    14. PhysRevB.107.075131 Spatial symmetry modulation of planar Hall effect in Weyl semimetals (planar, PRB)

    15. PhysRevB.107.075132 Shared universality of charged black holes and the complex large-$q$ Sachdev-Ye-Kitaev model (PRB)

    16. PhysRevB.107.075417 Anderson localization at the boundary of a two-dimensional topological superconductor (PRB)

    17. PhysRevB.107.085119 Effective medium model for graphene superlattices with electrostatic and magnetic vector potentials (PRB)

    18. PhysRevB.107.L081107 Quantum oscillations as a robust fingerprint of chiral anomaly in nonlinear response in Weyl semimetals (PRB)

    19. 2302.05078 Signatures of Chiral Superconductivity in Chiral Molecule Intercalated Tantalum Disulfide (TaS2, arXiv)

    20. 2302.05115 Unidirectional electron-phonon coupling as a fingerprint of the nematic state in a kagome superconductor (nematic, arXiv)

    21. 2302.05145 Discovery of Superconductivity in Van der Waals Ferromagnetic Sn$_{0.06}$Cr$_3$Te$_4$ (arXiv)

    22. 2302.05227 Charge Density Wave Order in Superconducting Topological Insulator Nbx-Bi2Se3 (arXiv)

    23. 2302.04877 Single monkey-saddle singularity at a two-dimensional Fermi surface and its instabilities (arXiv)

    24. 2302.05060 Chiral Fibonacci spin liquid in a $\mathbb{Z}_3$ Kitaev model (arXiv)

    25. 2302.05194 Non-Fermi liquid behavior of doped Kondo insulator: The unique properties of CeRhSb$_{1-x}$Te$_x$ (Ce, arXiv)
